{{Infobox football biography | playername = Maurice DalÃ© | image = | fullname = Maurice Junior DalÃ© | height = {{height|m=1.87|precision=0}} | dateofbirth = {{Birth date and age|1985|7|12|mf=y}} | cityofbirth = [[Martigues]] | countryofbirth = [[France]] | currentclub = [[FC Nantes]] | clubnumber = 17 | position = [[Forward (association football)|Striker]] | youthyears1 = | youthclubs1 = [[FC Martigues]] | years1 = 2005-2008 | years2 = 2007 | years3 = 2008-2009 | years4 = 2009-2010 | years5 = 2010-2011 | years6 = 2010-2011 | years7 = 2011- | clubs1 = [[FC Martigues]] | clubs2 = â [[US Le Pontet]] ''(loan)'' | clubs3 = [[AJ Auxerre]] | clubs4 = [[AC Arles]] | clubs5 = [[Unirea Urziceni]] | clubs6 = â [[Panserraikos F.C.]] ''(loan)'' | clubs7 = [[FC Nantes]] | caps1 = 93 | caps2 = 14 | caps3 = 1 | caps4 = 34 | caps5 = 2 | caps6 = 29 | goals1 = 19 | goals2 = 1 | goals3 = 0 | goals4 = 10 | goals5 = 0 | goals6 = 2 | nationalyears1 = | nationalteam1 = | nationalcaps1 = | nationalgoals1 = | pcupdate = 14 May 2010 }} ''' Maurice Junior DalÃ©''' (born July 12, 1985, [[Martigues]], [[France]]) is a [[France|French]] [[association football|footballer]] of [[Ivory Coast|Ivorian]] descent. He is currently under contract for [[FC Nantes]].
==Career== The French-Ivorian began his career with [[FC Martigues]],<ref>http://www.lequipe.fr/Football/20080604_184143_auxerre-recrute-un-buteur_Dev.html</ref> here played between 2007 joined than on loan to [[US Le Pontet]], after a half year turned than back to Martigues. DalÃ© left than in July 2008 Martigues and joined to [[AJ Auxerre]], here played his first professional game in the Ligue 1 on 13 December 2008 against [[Paris St. Germain]].<ref>http://www.transfermarkt.de/de/spielbericht/912908/aj-auxerre_fc-paris-st-germain/spielverlauf/index.html</ref> On 7 August 2009 [[AC Arles]] signed the forward from [[AJ Auxerre]].<ref>[http://www.4-4-2.com/displaynews/date/2009/08/07/maurice-dale-verlaesst-auxerre.html Der franzÃ¶sische Angreifer heuert bei der AC Arles an]</ref> After one season with [[AC Arles-Avignon]], the French forward signed for [[Unirea Urziceni]].<ref>[http://www.gsp.ro/fotbal/liga-1/exclusiv-unirea-urziceni-il-ia-pe-maurice-dale-golgeterul-nou-promovatei-in-ligue-1-arles-avignon-193611.html EXCLUSIV // Unirea Urziceni Ã®l ia pe Maurice Dale, golgeterul nou promovatei Ã®n Ligue 1, Arles-Avignon]</ref> Due to financial problems of [[Unirea Urziceni]], DalÃ© on 25 August 2010 agreed to go on loan to [[Panserraikos F.C.]] for one year.<ref>http://news.pathfinder.gr/sports/650806.html</ref> On 3 October 2010, he scored his first goal for [[Panserraikos F.C.]] on the 1-0 home win of his team against [[Larissa F.C.]].<ref>http://www.superleaguegreece.net/game/1011036/</ref> After two year stint at Romania and Greece, he returned to France and joined [[FC Nantes]] on 28 June 2011.<ref>[http://www.fcnantes.com/articles/article2809.php?num=4907] [[FC Nantes]] {{fr icon}}</ref>
==Clubs== * 2005-2006 : {{Flag icon|France}} [[FC Martigues]] (27 games; 2 goals) * 2006-2007 : {{Flag icon|France}} [[FC Martigues]] (12 games) * 2006-2007 : {{Flag icon|France}} [[US Le Pontet]] (14 games; 2 goals) * 2007-2008 : {{Flag icon|France}} [[FC Martigues]] (37 games; 15 buts) * 2008-2009 : {{Flag icon|France}} [[AJ Auxerre]] (1 game) * 2009-2010 : {{Flag icon|France}} [[AC Arles]] (34 games; 10 goals) * 2010-2011 : {{Flag icon|Romania}} [[Unirea Urziceni]] (2 games) * 2010-2011 : {{Flag icon|Greece}} [[Panserraikos F.C.]] (29 games; 2 goals) * 2011-2012 : {{Flag icon|France}} [[FC Nantes]]
